title: DNAnexus App/Applet Metadata
description: Metadata specification for DNAnexus apps and applets. Apps and applets have different requirements: apps require 'developers', 'authorizedUsers', and 'regionalOptions'; applets only require basic fields and can use top-level 'systemRequirements'.

name.description: Unique identifier for the app(let). Can contain lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores. No spaces allowed.
name.markdownDescription:
**App/Applet Name**  
Unique identifier for the app or applet. Can contain lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens (`-`), and underscores (`_`). No spaces or uppercase letters allowed. Example: `my-app` or `my_app_01`.  

**Note:** An **app** name cannot be changed across versions, but an **applet** name can be changed.

title.description: Human readable name shown in the UI.
title.markdownDescription:
**Title**  
Human readable name for the app, shown in the DNAnexus UI.

summary.description: Short summary of the app's functionality.
summary.markdownDescription:
**Summary**  
Short summary describing the app's main purpose.

description.description: Detailed description of the app, its features, and usage notes.
description.markdownDescription:
**Description**  
Detailed description of the app, its features, and any important usage notes. If not provided, `dx build` includes the `Readme.md` file content.

developerNotes.description: Detailed notes covering extra details for developers.
developerNotes.markdownDescription:
**Developer Notes**  
Detailed notes for developers working with this app. If not provided, `dx build` includes the `Readme.developer.md` file content, if available.

dxapi.description: DNAnexus API version required by the app.
dxapi.markdownDescription:
**dxAPI**  
DNAnexus API version required by the app. Example: `1.0.0`.

version.markdownDescription:
**Version**  
Semantic versioning for the app following [semver](https://semver.org/) specification. Examples: `1.0.0`, `1.0.0-rc.1`, `1.0.0+build.123`. Update this field whenever you make changes to the app.

openSource.description: Whether the contents of this app version's resources container should be viewable by all members of the app's developers and authorized users
openSource.markdownDescription:
**Open Source**  
Set to `true` if you want the contents of this app version's resources container to be viewable by all members of the app's developers and authorized users.

oneOf.description: Enable HTTPS app with default settings.
HTTPS app configuration with custom settings.

ports.description: Array of ports to expose via HTTPS proxy.
ports.markdownDescription:
**Ports**  
Array of ports to allow access through the HTTPS proxy. Allowed values: `443`, `8080`, `8081`.

shared_access.description: Access level required to access the HTTPS endpoint.
shared_access.markdownDescription:
**Shared Access**  
Restrict access to users with the specified project access level. Use `NONE` to limit access to only the launching user.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Users with VIEW access to the project can access the endpoint.
Users with CONTRIBUTE access to the project can access the endpoint.
Users with ADMINISTER access to the project can access the endpoint.
Only the launching user can access the endpoint.

httpsApp.description: Enable HTTPS access to jobs. Can be boolean or object with ports and shared_access.
httpsApp.markdownDescription:
**HTTPS App**  
Externally expose jobs to the internet via an HTTPS proxy at `https://job-xxxx.dnanexus.cloud/`. Set to `true` for default settings, or provide an object to configure `ports` and `shared_access`.

inputSpec.description: Defines the input parameters for the app.
inputSpec.markdownDescription:
**Input Specification**  
Defines the input parameters for the app.

name.markdownDescription:
**Input Name**  
Name of the input parameter.

class.description: Data type of the input parameter.
class.markdownDescription:
**Input Class**  
Data type of the input parameter.

optional.description: Whether the input parameter is optional.
optional.markdownDescription:
**Optional**  
Set to `true` if the input parameter is optional.

default.description: Default value for the input parameter.
default.markdownDescription:
**Default**  
Default value for the input parameter.

patterns.description: Patterns to validate the input parameter.
patterns.markdownDescription:
**Patterns**  
Patterns to validate the input parameter.

help.description: Help text for the input parameter.
help.markdownDescription:
**Help**  
Help text for the input parameter.

name.markdownDescription:
**Name**  
Display label shown in the UI for this suggestion.

project.description: ID of the project containing suggested inputs.
project.markdownDescription:
**Project**  
Project ID where suggested files are located. Example: `project-xxxx`

path.description: Folder path in the project (defaults to '/').
path.markdownDescription:
**Path**  
Folder path within the project. Defaults to `/` if not specified.

suggestions.description: Array of suggestion objects to help users select input values.
suggestions.markdownDescription:
**Suggestions**  
Help users select input values by suggesting projects and folders containing appropriate files.

group.description: Grouping label shown in UI to organize inputs.
group.markdownDescription:
**Group**  
Grouping label used to organize related inputs in the UI. Example: `Advanced Options`

choices.description: Enumerated choices restricting possible values for this input.
choices.markdownDescription:
**Choices**  
Restrict this input to a specific set of allowed values. The type of array items should match the input class.

outputSpec.description: Defines the output parameters for the app.
outputSpec.markdownDescription:
**Output Specification**  
Defines the output parameters for the app.

name.markdownDescription:
**Output Name**  
Name of the output parameter.

class.description: Data type of the output parameter.
class.markdownDescription:
**Output Class**  
Data type of the output parameter.

patterns.description: Patterns to validate the output parameter.
patterns.markdownDescription:
**Patterns**  
Patterns to validate the output parameter.

help.description: Help text for the output parameter.
help.markdownDescription:
**Help**  
Help text for the output parameter.

runSpec.description: Defines how the app is executed, including interpreter, entry point, OS, dependencies, and more.
runSpec.markdownDescription:
**Run Specification**  
Defines how the app is executed, including interpreter, entry point, OS, dependencies, and more.

assetDepends.description: List of asset dependencies required by the app.
assetDepends.markdownDescription:
**Asset Dependencies**  
List of asset dependencies required by the app. Each item must specify either an `id` (string) or a combination of `name`, `project`, and `version` (all strings). Optionally, `folder` (string) can be included.

bundledDepends.description: Bundled dependencies for the app. Files to be made available in the execution environment.
bundledDepends.markdownDescription:
**Bundled Dependencies**  
List of files to be made available in the execution environment. Each item specifies a `name` (filename) and `id` (DNAnexus link to the file).

headJobOnDemand.description: Whether headJobOnDemand is enabled by default for this app(let). Can be overridden at runtime.
headJobOnDemand.markdownDescription:
**Head Job On Demand**  
Enable head job on demand by default. When enabled, the head job (entry point) runs only when needed, reducing costs for workflow orchestration. Can be overridden at runtime.

oneOf.description: Allow all entry points to be restarted.
List of specific entry point names that can be restarted.

restartableEntryPoints.description: Entry points that may be restarted if a restartable error occurs.
restartableEntryPoints.markdownDescription:
**Restartable Entry Points**  
Specify which entry points can be automatically restarted on restartable errors. Use `"all"` to allow all entry points, or provide an array of specific entry point names.

executionPolicy.markdownDescription:
**Execution Policy**  
Configure automatic restart behavior for jobs. Specify restart limits for different error types.

restartOn.description: Mapping of restartable failure reasons to restart limits.
restartOn.markdownDescription:
**Restart On**  
Map restartable failure reasons to maximum restart attempts. The value is the maximum number of restart attempts (integer).

**Example:**
```json
{
  "*": 1,
  "UnresponsiveWorker": 3,
  "SpotInstanceInterruption": 5
}
```

ExecutionError.description: Maximum restart attempts when execution fails with error.
ExecutionError.markdownDescription:
**Execution Error**  
Maximum number of restart attempts when execution fails with an error.

UnresponsiveWorker.description: Maximum restart attempts when worker becomes unresponsive.
UnresponsiveWorker.markdownDescription:
**Unresponsive Worker**  
Maximum number of restart attempts when the worker becomes unresponsive.

JMInternalError.description: Maximum restart attempts for job manager internal errors.
JMInternalError.markdownDescription:
**Job Manager Internal Error**  
Maximum number of restart attempts for job manager internal errors.

AppInternalError.description: Maximum restart attempts for application internal errors.
AppInternalError.markdownDescription:
**Application Internal Error**  
Maximum number of restart attempts for application internal errors.

JobTimeoutExceeded.description: Maximum restart attempts when job exceeds timeout limit.
JobTimeoutExceeded.markdownDescription:
**Job Timeout Exceeded**  
Maximum number of restart attempts when the job exceeds its timeout limit.

SpotInstanceInterruption.description: Maximum restart attempts when spot instance is interrupted.
SpotInstanceInterruption.markdownDescription:
**Spot Instance Interruption**  
Maximum number of restart attempts when a spot instance is interrupted.

*.description: Maximum restart attempts for all other restartable failure reasons.
*.markdownDescription:
**All Other Failures**  
Maximum number of restart attempts for all restartable failure reasons not explicitly specified above.

systemRequirements.markdownDescription:
**System Requirements**  
System requirements for execution. **Deprecated for both apps and applets.** Use `regionalOptions.<region>.systemRequirements` instead. Apps must specify requirements for all regions they support; applets should specify requirements for the region where they run.
systemRequirements.deprecationMessage: This property is deprecated. Use 'regionalOptions.<region>.systemRequirements' instead for region-specific system requirements.

interpreter.description: The language interpreter to use for running the app.
interpreter.markdownDescription:
**Interpreter**  
The language interpreter to use for running the app.
markdownEnumDescriptions: **DEPRECATED** Python 2.7 interpreter. DNAnexus stopped updating the Python 2 AEE on March 1, 2021, and no longer accepts new applets or apps with `python2.7`. Python 2 reached End-of-Life on January 1, 2020. Existing apps/applets using `python2.7` continue to run for reproducibility, but this value should only be present in historical versions.

file.markdownDescription:
**File**  
Entry point script filename for the app.

distribution.markdownDescription:
**Distribution**  
Operating system distribution for the app. Only `Ubuntu` is supported.
markdownEnumDescriptions: The only supported OS distribution for DNAnexus apps.

release.markdownDescription:
**Release**  
Ubuntu release version for the app.

version.markdownDescription:
**Execution Environment Version**  
Specifies the version of the execution environment. Only `0` is supported. This field, together with `distribution` and `release`, determines the complete execution environment configuration.

execDepends.markdownDescription:
**execDepends**  
List of software dependencies required by the app. See execDepends.schema.json for details.

timeoutPolicy.description: Timeout policy for app execution. Keys can be entry point names or '*' for all. Each value is an object with 'minutes' or 'hours'.

developers.description: List of developer usernames (required for apps, optional for applets).
developers.markdownDescription:
**Developers** (required for apps)  
List of developer usernames who can modify the app. **Required for apps, optional for applets.** Developers have permission to create new versions and manage the app.

authorizedUsers.description: List of authorized user IDs (required for apps, optional for applets).
authorizedUsers.markdownDescription:
**Authorized Users** (required for apps)  
List of authorized user IDs or org IDs who can access and run the app. **Required for apps, optional for applets.** Use `'PUBLIC'` to make the app publicly available, or `'org-xxxx'` for organization-wide access.

regionalOptions.description: Region-specific options for app execution (required for apps, optional for applets).
regionalOptions.markdownDescription:
**Regional Options** (required for apps)  
Region-specific options for app execution. Keys must be valid DNAnexus region names. **Required for apps** (which must specify resources and requirements per region). **Optional for applets** (which can use top-level `systemRequirements` and `resources` instead).

allOf.description: System requirements for this AWS region. Keys are entry point names (e.g., 'main', 'process') or '*' for all entry points.

bundledDepends.markdownDescription:
**Bundled Dependencies**  
Bundled dependencies for this region. Each item specifies a name and a DNAnexus link to the file.

assetDepends.markdownDescription:
**Asset Dependencies**  
Asset dependencies specific to this region. Overrides or supplements the global assetDepends.

resources.description: Resources colocated with this region. Can be a project ID or array of file IDs.
resources.markdownDescription:
**Resources**  
Resources colocated with this region. Supply a project ID (string) or array of file IDs that are specific to this region.

allOf.description: System requirements for this Azure region. Keys are entry point names (e.g., 'main', 'process') or '*' for all entry points.

bundledDepends.markdownDescription:
**Bundled Dependencies**  
Bundled dependencies for this region. Each item specifies a name and a DNAnexus link to the file.

assetDepends.markdownDescription:
**Asset Dependencies**  
Asset dependencies specific to this region. Overrides or supplements the global assetDepends.

resources.description: Resources colocated with this region. Can be a project ID or array of file IDs.
resources.markdownDescription:
**Resources**  
Resources colocated with this region. Supply a project ID (string) or array of file IDs that are specific to this region.

allOf.description: System requirements for this OCI region. Keys are entry point names (e.g., 'main', 'process') or '*' for all entry points.

bundledDepends.markdownDescription:
**Bundled Dependencies**  
Bundled dependencies for this region. Each item specifies a name and a DNAnexus link to the file.

assetDepends.markdownDescription:
**Asset Dependencies**  
Asset dependencies specific to this region. Overrides or supplements the global assetDepends.

resources.description: Resources colocated with this region. Can be a project ID or array of file IDs.
resources.markdownDescription:
**Resources**  
Resources colocated with this region. Supply a project ID (string) or array of file IDs that are specific to this region.

details.description: Arbitrary metadata for the app. Recognized fields include contact info, upstream version, author, URL, licenses, citations, and changelog.
details.markdownDescription:
**Details**  
Arbitrary metadata for the app. The properties listed below are **recognized by the DNAnexus platform**, but you can add any custom key-value pairs.

**Custom keys example:**
```json
{
  "contactEmail": "dev@example.com",
  "myCustomField": "custom value",
  "internalVersion": "v2.3.1"
}
```

contactEmail.description: Contact email for the app author or maintainer.
contactEmail.markdownDescription:
**Contact Email**  
Contact email for the app author or maintainer.

citations.markdownDescription:
**Citations**  
Citations for papers. Use DOI format: `doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btp352`

upstreamVersion.description: Version number of the upstream executable (e.g., 'bwa-mem 0.7.12').
upstreamVersion.markdownDescription:
**Upstream Version**  
Version number of the upstream executable. Example: `0.7.12`

upstreamAuthor.markdownDescription:
**Upstream Author**  
Name of the upstream author.

upstreamUrl.description: URL for the upstream executable or project.
upstreamUrl.markdownDescription:
**Upstream URL**  
URL for the upstream executable or project.

upstreamLicenses.markdownDescription:
**Upstream Licenses**  
Licenses for the upstream executable. Example: `GPLv3`, `MIT`

whatsNew.description: Changelog or release notes. Can use Markdown formatting.
whatsNew.markdownDescription:
**What's New**  
Changelog or release notes. Can use Markdown formatting.

categories.description: Categories for the app. Recognized categories are displayed specially on the DNAnexus Platform, but custom categories are also allowed.
categories.markdownDescription:
**Categories**  
Categorize your app for easier discovery on the DNAnexus platform. The values listed below are **recognized categories** that receive special treatment in the UI (organized sections, filtering, etc.). However, you can also specify **custom category names** if none of the recognized categories fit your use case.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Tools for annotating variants, genes, or genomic regions.
Export data to external formats or systems.
Machine learning and AI-based analysis tools.
Quality control, trimming, filtering of sequencing reads.
Call variants (SNPs, indels) from sequencing data.

access.description: Access control settings for the app. Request additional permissions beyond default limited access.
access.markdownDescription:
**Access**  
Request additional permissions for the app. By default, apps have limited access to ensure privacy and reproducibility. See [App Permissions](https://documentation.dnanexus.com/developer/apps/app-permissions) for details.

project.description: Access level to the project in which the app/applet is run.
project.markdownDescription:
**Project Access**  
Grant the app/applet access to the project in which it is run.  

**Default:** `NONE` for **apps**, `VIEW` for **applets**.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Can upload files to the project.
Can create, modify, and delete objects.
Full administrative access to the project.

allProjects.description: Access level to all projects the user can access.
allProjects.markdownDescription:
**All Projects Access**  
Grant the app access to all projects the user running the app can access. Use this carefully as it grants broad access.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Read-only access to all user projects.
Can upload files to all user projects.
Can create, modify, and delete objects in all user projects.
Full administrative access to all user projects.

oneOf.description: List of specific domains the app can access.

network.description: Network access permissions. Provide specific domains or '*' for all.
network.markdownDescription:
**Network Access**  
Grant the app network access. Provide an array of specific domains (e.g., `['github.com', 'api.example.com']`) or use `'*'` to allow all domains.

developer.description: Allow the app to act as a developer on behalf of the user.
developer.markdownDescription:
**Developer Access**  
Grant the app permissions to act as a developer on behalf of the user. This allows the app to create new apps, access unpublished apps, etc. **Use with extreme caution**.

ignoreReuse.description: If true, disables reuse of previous results.
ignoreReuse.markdownDescription:
**Ignore Reuse**  
If true, disables reuse of previous results.

treeTurnaroundTimeThreshold.description: Threshold for tree turnaround time in seconds.
treeTurnaroundTimeThreshold.markdownDescription:
**Tree Turnaround Time Threshold (in seconds)**  
For a root execution, the turnaround time is the time between its creation time and the time it reaches the [terminal state](https://documentation.dnanexus.com/user/running-apps-and-workflows/job-lifecycle) (or the current time if it is not in a terminal state). The terminal states of an execution are `done`, `terminated`, and `failed`.

resources.description: Resource files or directories (deprecated, use regionalOptions instead).
resources.markdownDescription:
**Resources**  
Resource files or directories to include in the execution environment. **Deprecated for both apps and applets.** Use `regionalOptions.<region>.resources` instead. Apps must specify resources for all regions they support; applets should specify resources for the region where they run.
resources.deprecationMessage: This property is deprecated. Use 'regionalOptions.<region>.resources' instead for region-specific resources.
